column3: News;Phnom Penh: A drunken Khmer man was left bleeding after an incident with foreigners near GSM on Street 51/154 at 3 am on February 8th.------The injured man
column6: was very drunk and was giving unwarranted attention to a foreign woman.------A foreign man did not like this behaviour
column7: and a shouting match broke out. After arguing
column8: the foreigner pushed the local man
column9: who slipped and hurt his head
column10: mainly due to his drunken state.------Locals came to mediate and translate for the police
column11: who decided to let the foreigners go back to where they were staying.------The injured man was invited to make a complaint
